title: New Life

tokens.lyric: Where are His children who answered the call

lines.raw: [G]Where are His children who answered the call

tokens.lyric: Of the archangel sounding afar?

lines.raw: [D7]Of the archangel sounding afar?

tokens.lyric: People who trembled as lightning flashed,

lines.raw: [G]People who trembled as lightning flashed,

tokens.lyric: Blazing the sky from the East to the West,

lines.raw: [C]Blazing the sky from the East to the West,

tokens.lyric: Dark is the sun, dim is the moon,

lines.raw: [G]Dark is the sun, dim is the moon,

tokens.lyric: Thousands of stars falling to darkness;

lines.raw: [D7]Thousands of stars falling to darkness;

tokens.lyric: Where are the ones blessed with new life,

lines.raw: [G7]Where are the ones blessed with new life,

tokens.lyric: Liberated from the dead?

lines.raw: [Am]Liberated from the dead?

tokens.lyric: Now we behold a new heaven and earth,

lines.raw: [G]Now we behold a new heaven and earth,

tokens.lyric: Holy Jerusalem, standing anew;

lines.raw: [D7]Holy Jerusalem, standing anew;

tokens.lyric: After our search of six thousand years,

lines.raw: [G]After our search of six thousand years,

tokens.lyric: Eden rejoices to welcome us home.

lines.raw: [C]Eden rejoices to welcome us home.

tokens.lyric: All of our tears, wipe them away;

lines.raw: [G]All of our tears, wipe them away;

tokens.lyric: Sorrowful sighs, we will not need them;

lines.raw: [D7]Sorrowful sighs, we will not need them;

tokens.lyric: Where is my Lord, He who returns?

lines.raw: [G]Where is my Lord, He who returns?

tokens.lyric: Where is Heaven's glorious One?

lines.raw: [C]Where is Heaven's glorious One?

tokens.lyric: Once He departed by way of the cross,

lines.raw: [G]Once He departed by way of the cross,

tokens.lyric: Now He returns and He suffers again;

lines.raw: [D7]Now He returns and He suffers again;

tokens.lyric: One way is given to me our Lord;

lines.raw: [G]One way is given to me our Lord;

tokens.lyric: Follow the path to the bottom of hell.

lines.raw: [C]Follow the path to the bottom of hell.

tokens.lyric: Glorious star, Lebanon's light,

lines.raw: [G]Glorious star, Lebanon's light,

tokens.lyric: Shining on all, lighting the ages;

lines.raw: [D7]Shining on all, lighting the ages;

tokens.lyric: There is the great city of God,

lines.raw: [G]There is the great city of God,

tokens.lyric: Where the sun arises and shines.

lines.raw: [C]Where the sun arises and shines.

tokens.lyric: Come in rejoicing and look to the light,

lines.raw: [G]Come in rejoicing and look to the light,

tokens.lyric: See how the darkness is rolling away;

lines.raw: [D7]See how the darkness is rolling away;

tokens.lyric: Out of the few come a multitude;

lines.raw: [G]Out of the few come a multitude;

tokens.lyric: Joyfully building the city of God.

lines.raw: [C]Joyfully building the city of God.

tokens.lyric: Children of life stream thru the gates,

lines.raw: [G]Children of life stream thru the gates,

tokens.lyric: Close to His heart, singing to please Him;

lines.raw: [D7]Close to His heart, singing to please Him;

tokens.lyric: Raising the white cross to the sky,

lines.raw: [G]Raising the white cross to the sky,

tokens.lyric: Praising our eternal new life.

lines.raw: [C]Praising our eternal new life.
